1.content:
You awaken, dazed and confused. You look around your environment to notice everything large compared to you. Estimating your height to be an inch tall you continue to search the area only to come across a giant lady.

Firstly who are you and who is she?
1.title: Beginnings

11.content:
Jay, Male, 18 Years Old.
Brown hair, hazel eyes.
Slightly above average weight.

Now who is she?
11.title: Jay, Male, 18 Years old.

choices: Run towards her tea and climb in.
111.content:
Before you is the tall sexy redhead Karen Gillan.
She is busy reading as she sits and sips her tea.

You find that you are on the table and decide on what you should do next.
111.title: Karen Gillan

choices: Karen spotted something in her drink.
1111.content:
You start to head towards her tea before climbing up her Jacuzzi like drink. Sitting on the rim of the cup, you enjoyed having your feet in the drink, it was as if you were by the pool side. You watched the titanic Redhead as she went about her day, before finally reaching out for her drink.

You panic as you launch into her tea with no way out. You tried climbing the sides but they were too wet. All you could do was watch her lips coming towards you with speed.
1111.title: Tea sweetener

info.brief_description: Some how shrunken you meet a giant Karen Gillan or one of the characters she plays.
info.description:
Rules:

- No Male interactions with the main character.
- Spell and grammar check.
